title: Raining under Sun
alt: Raindrops fall, beneath the sun's bright gaze, a dance of contrasts, nature's mystic ways.

title: Sunshine on Leaves
alt: Golden sun, leaves shimmer and sway.

title: Galactic Jellyfish
alt: Stars shimmer, forming jellyfish's grace, galactic wanderer, adrift in cosmic space.

title: Butterfly and Rose
alt: Amidst twilight's veil, butterfly and rose unite, whispering secrets, a dance of mystic light.

title: Firefly in Dark Forest
alt: Fireflies twinkle, enchanting the night, so wander deep into the forest's embrace.

title: A Small Bed
alt: In the gentlest glow, a cozy bed awaits.
